code: export function GetCookie(cname){var name=cname+"=";var decodedCookie=decodeURIComponent(document.cookie);var ca=decodedCookie.split(";");for(var i=0;i<ca.length;i++){var c=ca[i];while(c.charAt(0)===" "){c=c.substring(1);}if(c.indexOf(name)===0){return c.substring(name.length,c.length);}}return null;}export function SetCookie(name,value,exdays){var d=new Date();d.setTime(d.getTime()+exdays*24*60*60*1000);var expires="expires="+d.toUTCString();document.cookie=name+"="+value+";"+expires+";path=/";}export function CheckCookie(cname,renew,exdays){var cookie=GetCookie(cname);if(cookie===null)return false;else if(cookie!==null&&!renew)return true;else if(cookie!==null&&renew){SetCookie(cname,cookie,exdays);return true;}}export function DeleteCookie(name){if(GetCookie(name)){document.cookie=name+"="+";expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT";return true;}else return false;}export function EncodeCookie(str){return window.btoa(unescape(encodeURIComponent(str)));}export function DecodeCookie(str){return decodeURIComponent(escape(window.atob(str)));}
